verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] tweeted in reaction to Saturday 's terrorist attack in Paris , calling it ' sickness and hatred . '
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: tweeted] [ARGM-PRP: in reaction to Saturday 's terrorist attack in Paris] , [ARGM-ADV: calling it ' sickness and hatred] . '
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has tweeted in reaction to Saturday 's terrorist attack in Paris , [V: calling] [ARG1: it] [ARG2: ' sickness and hatred] . '
